alert.note: Alert for Chase; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 8:03PM CDT until May 31 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chase County in east central Kansas... Marion County in central Kansas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 802 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Marion, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing large hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Marion, Peabody, Florence, Goessel, Burns, Lincolnville, Ramona, Lehigh, Durham, Tampa, Lost Springs, Cedar Point, Marion Lake and Pilsen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
